name: Clickteez
tag_list: t-shirts, tees, apparel, garments, custom, bespoke, one-off
overview:
Create custom one-off T-Shirts with photos uploaded from your computer or mobile app.

Our mission is twofold - The first is aimed at the consumer, and the second for the app developer or content owners:-

  1. Make the process of making a custom tee as simple as possible: ‘Upload’ image -> ‘Choose’ the garment -> ‘Buy’ Custom Tee. No separate registration necessary, or filling in account details.

  2. Montetize photo apps and content sites - The Clickteez platform has been created from the ground up to enable third-parties to use our API for their own apps / websites, and share the in the revenue from the sale of the finished garment.

Our websites so far: http://clickteez.me http://instateez.me

You can upload an image from your computer or link to your Instagram photos and make a custom tee at the click of a button. We ship internationally.

We’re currently developing new sites - ‘4sqTees’ (Foursquare), ‘Faceteez’ (Facebook), with Twitter and Flickr in the pipeline.

The focus now is to develop the business to prepare it for rapid growth worldwide, as we form alliances with new content partners.
